Package net.codemusic.smartears.event

Interface Summary
ExampleListener An interface that should be implemented by classes needing to be connected to the ExampleEvent system.
ExcerciseListener This interface should be implemented by classes intreseted in being connected to the excercise event subsystem
IExampleEventManager Handles the registering, unregistering, and notifying of ExampleListeners
IExcerciseEventManager Classes implementing this interface will handle registering, unregistering, and propogating ExcerciseEvents to ExcerciseListeners
IScoreEventManager This interface represents a class that is responsible for registering, unregistering, and propogating ScoreEvents to ScoreListeners
ISettingsEventManager This interface represents a class that is responsble for registering, unregistering, and propogating SettingsEvents to SettingsListeners
ScoreListener This interface should be implemented my classes wishing to tie in to the ScoreEvent subsystem
SettingsListener An interface that should be implemented by classes wishing to tie into the Settings Event subsystem
 

Class Summary
EventManager This class handles registering, unregistering, and notifying all of the model-related event listeners in the SmartEars system.
ExampleAdapter This is a conveniece Adapter that provides no-op implementations of the ExampleListener interface.
ExampleEvent This Event encapsulates information about events dealing with examples
ExcerciseAdapter This is a conveniece Adapter that provides no-op implementations of the ExcerciseListener interface.
ExcerciseEvent This class represents an event dealing with an IExcercise
PlayEvent This event occurs when a new Example is played for the user to answer/identify
RepeatEvent Occurs when the user requests another hearing of a previously played Example
ScoreAdapter The ScoreAdapter is a convenience class that provides no-op implementations of the ScoreListener interface.
ScoreEvent This event happens when the user's score is altered
SettingsAdapter This is a conveniece Adapter that provides no-op implementations of the SettingsListener interface.
SettingsEvent This event represents a change in the user's preferences
